name: classes
description: Classes to add to the image element.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the image.

name: src
description: Image source used when sources array not provided, or none of the sources match

name: width
description: If provided, set the intrinsic width of the image

name: height
description: If provided, set the intrinsic height of the image

name: widths
description: Assumed widths (in css units, such as px or vw) of the image onscreen. Used when selecting an image to display on the given viewport.

params.name: mobile
params.description: Assumed width (in css units) of the image when selecting a source image on mobile viewports

params.name: mobileLarge
params.description: Assumed width (in css units) of the image when selecting a source image on large mobile viewports

params.name: tablet
params.description: Assumed width (in css units) of the image when selecting a source image on tablet viewports

params.name: desktop
params.description: Assumed width (in css units) of the image when selecting a source image on desktop viewports

params.name: wide
params.description: Assumed width (in css units) of the image when selecting a source image on wide viewports

items.name: type
items.description: Mime type of the source type

items.name: width
items.description: Width descriptor of the image. Default value is infinity.
